text: This Is Us kicked off its second season last year with a bit of a stumble, courtesy of NBC: the network announced at its 2017 upfront that the show would move to Thursdays, only to backtrack two weeks later. But then the drama went on to do something that few
title: After Avoiding the Sophomore Slump, This Is Us Is NBC’s Best Hope to Maintain Its Demo Lead

twitter.title: After Avoiding the Sophomore Slump, This Is Us Is NBC’s Best Hope to Maintain Its Demo Lead
twitter.description: The network didn’t consider relocating the show to Thursday, as it almost did last year.
